name: MC-Market Dark Theme
description:
A dark theme for MC-Market.

This is my first time "coding" in CSS, so please, bear with me as I learn. There may be issues with some places not being properly replaced, however, I intend to fix them as fast as I find them. Some text colours may be a bit difficult to read, please let me know which ones and I'll fix them immediately. I've tried my best to maintain the layout and overall feel of the website without being too disruptive with the changes.

Note; the license may change at any time with no notice, please check it before you plan on doing anything with or to the style.
additional_info:
# Version - 1.0.4
Applied dark colours to the member card.

# Version - 1.0.3
Completely revamped how borders are handled.
Revamped a few colour palettes.
Fixed several missing dark coloured borders.
Fixed an issue with expanded images not having a dark background.
Fixed a few resource and avatar image backgrounds not being replaced with a dark background.

# Version - 1.0.2
Cleaned up the page navigation buttons.
Fixed a few instances of nearly unreadable text.
Applied dark colours to the search menu.
Applied dark colours to the chat enable button.

# Version - 1.0.1
Applied dark colours to resource and avatar icons.

# Version - 1.0.0
Initial release.
